highlights: Full support and administration of Windows-based infrastructure for a hotel complex (80+ active users, several VLAN segments).
Active Directory: user lifecycle, OU structure, GPOs, logon scripts, roaming profiles, security policies; integrations with Exchange, file servers and internal apps.
Windows Server (2019/2022): AD DS, DNS, DHCP, Group Policy, Print Services; update strategy, backups, performance monitoring.
Password, access and security policies aligned with GDPR requirements.
Network administration: VLAN segmentation (guests, staff, admin, POS), L3 switches, VPN tunnels; firewall policies, internet access control, QoS, logging.
Designed and deployed multi-VLAN networks with distinct access levels (guests, admin, IP telephony, CCTV, etc.).
Integrated and configured SALTO access control (electronic locks and permissions).
Managed server services: DHCP, DNS, file/app servers, backups and monitoring.
Firewall log analysis and filtering to prevent attacks and unauthorized access.
Wi-Fi/LAN operations: switches, routers, APs, PoE devices; QoS tuning and throughput optimization.
Phone and online support for first-time mesh setup and device onboarding.
Eero networks: SSID, bridge/router modes, ISP integration and troubleshooting (latency, stability, coverage).
Helped connect smart devices (cameras, assistants, TVs) to Wi-Fi and improved coverage plans.
Clear documentation and CRM ticketing for traceable, high-quality support.
